verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> or Psalm <S%H4210><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> to the chief <S%H5329><s%> Musician <S%H5329><s%> upon Mahalath <S%H4257><s%> Leannoth, <S%H6030><s%> Maschil <S%H4905><s%> of Heman <S%H1968><s%> the Ezrahite. <S%H250><s%> O lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of my salvation, <S%H3444><s%> I have cried <S%H6817><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> you:
Let my prayer <S%H8605><s%> come <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you: incline <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%> to my cry; <S%H7440><s%>
For my soul <S%H5315><s%> is full <S%H7654><s%> of troubles: <S%H7451><s%> and my life <S%H2416><s%> draws near <S%H5060><s%> to the grave. <S%H7585><s%>
I am counted <S%H2803><s%> with them that go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit: <S%H953><s%> I am <S%H1961><s%> as a man <S%H1397><s%> that has no <S%H369><s%> strength: <S%H353><s%>

Free <S%H2670><s%> among the dead, <S%H4191><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> the slain <S%H2491><s%> that lie <S%H7901><s%> in the grave, <S%H6913><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you remember <S%H2142><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more: <S%H5750><s%> and they are cut <S%H1504><s%> off from your hand. <S%H3027><s%>
You have laid <S%H7896><s%> me in the lowest <S%H8482><s%> pit, <S%H953><s%> in darkness, <S%H4285><s%> in the deeps. <S%H4688><s%>
Your wrath <S%H2534><s%> lies <S%H5564><s%> hard <S%H5564><s%> on me, and you have afflicted <S%H6031><s%> me with all <S%H3605><s%> your waves. <S%H4867><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

You have put <S%H7368><s%> away <S%H7368><s%> my acquaintance <S%H3045><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from me; you have made <S%H7896><s%> me an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to them: I am shut <S%H3607><s%> up, and I cannot <S%H3808><s%> come <S%H3318><s%> forth. <S%H3318><s%>

My eye <S%H5869><s%> mourns <S%H1669><s%> by reason <S%H4480><s%> of affliction: <S%H6040><s%> LORD, <S%H3068><s%> I have called <S%H7121><s%> daily <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> on you, I have stretched <S%H7849><s%> out my hands <S%H3709><s%> to you.
Will you show <S%H6213><s%> wonders <S%H6382><s%> to the dead? <S%H4191><s%> shall the dead <S%H7496><s%> arise <S%H6965><s%> and praise <S%H3034><s%> you? Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Shall your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> be declared <S%H5608><s%> in the grave? <S%H6913><s%> or your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> in destruction? <S%H11><s%>
Shall your wonders <S%H6382><s%> be known <S%H3045><s%> in the dark? <S%H2822><s%> and your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of forgetfulness? <S%H5388><s%>
But to you have I cried, <S%H7768><s%> O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> shall my prayer <S%H8605><s%> prevent <S%H6923><s%> you.
LORD, <S%H3068><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> cast <S%H2186><s%> you off my soul? <S%H5315><s%> why hide <S%H5641><s%> you your face <S%H6440><s%> from me?
I am afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and ready to die <S%H1478><s%> from my youth <S%H5290><s%> up: while I suffer <S%H5375><s%> your terrors <S%H367><s%> I am distracted. <S%H6323><s%>
Your fierce wrath <S%H2740><s%> goes <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> me; your terrors <S%H1161><s%> have cut <S%H6789><s%> me off.
They came <S%H5437><s%> round <S%H5437><s%> about me daily <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> like water; <S%H4325><s%> they compassed <S%H5362><s%> me about together. <S%H3162><s%>
Lover <S%H157><s%> and friend <S%H7453><s%> have you put <S%H7368><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from me, and my acquaintance <S%H3045><s%> into darkness. <S%H4285><s%>
